title: Fudêncio e Seus Amigos
overview: The series shows the daily life and bizarre adventures of a group of student children who are friends with a punk, mean and monosyllabic boy named Fudêncio. The drawing takes place in the fictitious school E.E.P.S.G. José Mojica Marins, probably located in São Paulo. The rating is recommended for ages 16+.
